channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description: Hey im on deltascape source and i was wondering if anyone knew what to search for to change the amount of exp u get from fishing and if there is any way to add more rewards from clue scrolls than just the standard delta ones[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2008, 11:44:14 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @sinler_range sinler range
item.description:
@sinler_range wrote:

idk about exp amounts but to cahnge clue rewards just open item.java and search clue then put in the item id where ever it shoudl go
